title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.44 - Unauthorized participation in hiring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.44 - Unauthorized participation in hiring

State Regulations

Except as specifically provided in section
7.20
(b) of this

Part, no person shall participate or attempt to participate in any way, directly or indirectly, in the identification, selection or designation of a
person for any list or roster established by the commission pursuant to these
regulations or for employment as a longshoreman or checker, or of a gang for
employment, except a licensed hiring agent, his superior or a person for whom
permission is granted by the commission upon application of his employer and
for whom appropriate identification has been issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
